06 Mar 2015

Pen Tool, We're Gonna Be BFFs

This was was my FIRST time learning and using the pen tool in Illustrator and it started out pretty rough. I did a little practice every day, and I think I’m getting a little better it at. It wasn’t as scary as I thought; once I got the hang of it, I knew the pen tool and I are going to be fast friends.

Week One’s exercises were to create super hero icons and and a selfie. Here’s mine:
